name: 7th Symposium Mines Guine
content: The 7th Symposium Mines Guinea is West Africa’s largest mining event and the second largest on the African continent. This edition is under the main theme of this edition is “Optimizing linkages with the mining industry to catalyse the social economic development of Guinea”. The event is organised by the Ministry of Mines & Geology, Republic of Guinea, in association with AME Trade Ltd. SMG is West Africa’s largest mining event and the second largest on the African continent.
